New Records: India have reached the finals of three back to back ICC tournaments - WTC, ODI World Cup and now T20 World Cup.
Key Match Events: India bowl out England in just 16.4 overs
Kuldeep completes a sensational spell of 4-0-19-3
Axar Patel strikes once again with two first ball strikes in back to back overs
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma's men have an opportunity to avenge that defeat as they will be facing England.
If rain abandons the game or forces a no-result, India will qualify for the final as they had more wins than England in the Super 8 stage.
Post-Match Reflections: Very satisfying to win this game. We worked really hard as a unit. To win this game like that was a great effort from everyone.
India certainly outplayed us. We let them get 20-25 runs too many. It was a challenging surface, they played well on.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ashwin has been live tweeting throughout the match. He has really enjoyed the game today.
Back to back World Cup finals for India
India are undefeated in the tournament, and today, Rohit Sharma's team were at the peak of their prowess.
Others: The wicket was stopping and keeping low, so tried to bowl in the right areas.
Our batters told us that the wicket wasn't easy, so 160 was a good total according to us.
